Text:
How many greatest hits you need?lol
Smashes,Thrashes & Hits isn't here either.
I knew they weren't here but i called it a discog anyway.I realize DP has a different version of strutter and STH had Let's Put the X in Sex(on box set disc 4)but i never liked either record and they don't exist in my world.How about all those extra live records?????? :)

Everything in one place.
An excellent collection.

My compliments to the uploader.

"More Kiss than you will ever need."  There can never be enough KISS.

"How many Greatest Hits you need"  THAT I agree with.  What's the use if you have the core CDs.

Many thanks.

Why the fuck do u need the best of solo albums when u got them all?
LOL.
holy live albums i've never heard of!!!
